document_data.mainbody:
Flaming orbs, were wizardly crystal orb implements that hid raging inferno inside them, popularized in the 15 century DR.
Flaming orbs served the purpose of enhancing a wizards fire-related magics, making the flames created hotted and damage more severe.
In the 15 century DR, various flaming orbs could be found among spellcasters of the Sword Mountains, areas surrounding the city and markets of Neverwinter.
